tool_description: Extracts customer review data for specified products within a given time range, including review text, ratings, timestamps, and reviewer information.

product_ids.description: List of product identifiers to extract reviews for

include_verified_only.description: Whether to include only verified purchase reviews

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and both dates must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Product not found: One or more product IDs do not exist in the system.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to access review data for specified products.
Data limit exceeded: Request exceeds maximum allowed number of reviews (10000 per request).
usage: Provide product_ids array, start_date, and end_date. Optionally set include_verified_only to filter for verified purchases only.
